title: Bolognese Sauce
description: Bolognese Sauce - Marcella Hazan classic + Kenji tested
steps: Cook onion, carrot, celery in butter and oil until softened, 10 minutes.
Add beef and pork, cook until no longer pink.
Add milk. Simmer until completely absorbed.
Simmer on lowest heat 3-4 hours, stirring occasionally.
Toss with fresh pasta and Parmesan.
notes: The milk before tomatoes is Hazan's secret - tenderizes meat.
True Bolognese is barely red - it's a meat sauce.
Traditionally served with tagliatelle, not spaghetti.
source: Marcella Hazan / Serious Eats (Marcella Hazan classic + Kenji tested)
